member.name: T:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayerRule
member.summary: MapLayerRule class. Base class for rules guiding automatic data-based rendering features.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayerRule.Binding
member.summary: The binding to use for acquiring data values for this rule.

member.name: T:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayerFillRule
member.summary: MapLayerFillRule class. Defines how shapes are colored according to data values.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayerFillRule.GetColorForValue(ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the brush corresponding to the given value for the given layer, according to this rule.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayerFillRule.AnimationStaggerDelay
member.summary: The delay of each subsequent color animation, in milliseconds. Default: 0 (off).
member.remarks: This delay is used to produce a staggered coloring effect.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayerFillRule.AnimationDuration
member.summary: The duration of the color animation, in milliseconds. Default: 0 (off).

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayerFillRule.Colors
member.summary: The value/colour combinations defining the rule.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayerFillRule.ColorFromPalette
member.summary: Whether to populate colour values based on the active palette.
member.remarks: When set to true, Color settings should be left blank in the Colors definition.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayerFillRule.Opacity
member.summary: The opacity to apply to the colours. Default: 1.

member.name: T:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayerSizeRule
member.summary: MapLayerSizeRule class. Defines how elements are sized according to data values.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayerSizeRule.GetSizeForValue(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the bubble size (in square pixels) corresponding to the given value, according to this rule.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayerSizeRule.AnimationStaggerDelay
member.summary: The delay of each subsequent sizing animation, in milliseconds. Default: 0 (off).
member.remarks: This delay is used to produce a staggered sizing effect.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayerSizeRule.AnimationDuration
member.summary: The duration of the sizing animation, in milliseconds. Default: 0 (off).

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayerSizeRule.Sizes
member.summary: The value/size mappings defining the rule.

member.name: T:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItemType
member.summary: MapItemType enumeration. Defines possible values for the MapItem.ItemType property.

member.name: F:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItemType.Point
member.summary: Specifies a map item composed of a point.

member.name: F:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItemType.Line
member.summary: Specifies a map item composed of one or more lines.

member.name: F:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItemType.Area
member.summary: Specifies a map item composed of one or more areas.

member.name: T:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem
member.summary: MapItem class. Defines a logical unit on the map, consisting of any number of visual elements.
member.remarks:
MapItems are created as they are loaded from the definition file. Each MapItem will contain its loaded meta-data in its property, a name-value dictionary.
To access the data object connected with that MapItem (if any), use the item's property.

member.name: F:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.BubbleFillRuleValueProperty
member.summary: BubbleFillRuleValue dependency property.

member.name: F:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.BubbleSizeRuleValueProperty
member.summary: BubbleSizeRuleValue dependency property.

member.name: F:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.FillRuleValueProperty
member.summary: FillRuleValue dependency property.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.#ctor(ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer,ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItemType)
member.summary: Instantiates a map item of the given type for the given layer.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.GetBoundingRectangle
member.summary: Returns the smallest rectangle containing all the elements of this item.
member.remarks: The rectangle coordinates are in pixels, relative to the visible map.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.GetCenterOfMass
member.summary: Returns the center of visual "mass" of the largest polygon among those belonging to this item.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.GetLabelBoundingRectangle
member.summary: Returns the bounding box within which the label would be contained.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.GetLargestPolygonBoundingRectangle
member.summary: Returns the bounding box of the largest polygon among those belonging to this item.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.SetToolTip(System.Object)
member.summary: Sets the tooltip content for this item.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.BubbleFill
member.summary: The fill to use for this item's bubble, if there is one.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.BubbleFillRuleValue
member.summary: The value of the bubble fill rule, if one is defined, for this item.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.BubbleSizeRuleValue
member.summary: The value of the bubble size rule (if defined) for this item.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.DataContext
member.summary: The data context for this item.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.DataItem
member.summary: The data object associated with this map item.
member.remarks: When using Binding syntax for item templates, for instance, a property of the MapItem's DataContext is referenced as "DataItem.PropertyName".

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.Elements
member.summary: Visual elements associated with this item.
member.remarks: All FrameworkElements which are currently rendered and associated with this logical map item are listed here.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.Fill
member.summary: The fill to use for this item. Overrides Style properties.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.FillRuleValue
member.summary: The value of the fill rule, if one is defined, for this item.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.IsEnabled
member.summary: Determines whether this item is enabled. Default: true.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.IsSelected
member.summary: Indicates whether this item is selected. Read-only.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.ItemType
member.summary: Describes the type of map item this is. Read-only.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.MetaData
member.summary: Meta data for this item.
member.remarks: MetaData entries are added automatically from DBF files, when available alongside the SHP. They can also be added programmatically. Typically, meta-data includes names of map items and/or unique identifiers which can be used for associating the map items with data.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.OwningLayer
member.summary: The layer to which this item belongs.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.PathStyle
member.summary: The style to apply to visual elements (XAML Paths) belonging to this item.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.Stroke
member.summary: The stroke to use for this item. Overrides Style properties.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem.Visibility
member.summary: Controls the visibility of all visual elements belonging to this map item. Default: Visible.

member.name: T:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItemMetaDataConverter
member.summary: MapItemDataConverter class. Can be used to bind directly to MapItem meta-data.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItemMetaDataConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a MapItem, given a meta-data key as the parameter, to the corresponding value in the item's meta-data.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItemMetaDataConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Unused.

member.name: T:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLabelFontSizeConverter
member.summary: MapItemDataConverter class. Can be used to determine optimal font size for an item label.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLabelFontSizeConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Given a TextBlock as the parameter, with a MapItem as its DataContext, returns the optimal font size for the map label.
member.remarks: The visibility of the TextBlock is automatically set to invisible if the resulting size is too small to show. The value parameter is unused.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLabelFontSizeConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Unused.

member.name: T:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapPopupVisibility
member.summary: MapElementVisibility enum. Used to specify the visibility mode of a map popup.

member.name: F:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapPopupVisibility.Off
member.summary: Never show popups.

member.name: F:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapPopupVisibility.OnIfHasData
member.summary: Show popups on MapItems which are bound to data.

member.name: F:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapPopupVisibility.On
member.summary: Always show popups.

member.name: T:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapElementVisibility
member.summary: MapElementVisibility enum. Used to specify the visibility mode of a map UI element.

member.name: F:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapElementVisibility.Visible
member.summary: Always visible.

member.name: F:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapElementVisibility.VisibleWhenZoomed
member.summary: Visible when the map is zoomed in.

member.name: F:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapElementVisibility.Hidden
member.summary: Never visible.

member.name: T:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapElementPosition
member.summary: MapElementPosition enum. Used to specify the position of the map's UI element relative to its frame.

member.name: T:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapTranslation
member.summary: MapTranslation class. Used to define the translation of points and shapes from one coordinate box to another.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapTranslation.FromBoundingBox
member.summary: Specifies the coordinate box to be translated from.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapTranslation.ToBoundingBox
member.summary: Specifies the coordinate box to translate the FromBoundingBox to, by translating and scaling all coordinates contained within the original box to corresponding ones in this one.

member.name: T:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map
member.summary: ComponentArt Map control. Rich, interactive visualization of geographic and other shape-based data.
member.remarks: The basic ingredient in a Map control is the . At least one layer is required to produce a meaningful visualization, but any number can be laid over one another. In a typical scenario, the first map layer defines basic shapes, such as territories. These shapes can be coloured according to data values, or can include content displayed over the shapes, based on templates bound with data. To learn more about this control see the list of Map tutorials.

member.name: F:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.CanvasEffectProperty
member.summary: CanvasEffectProperty dependency property.

member.summary: CoordinateGridBrushProperty dependency property.

member.summary: DownloadProgressTemplateProperty dependency property.

member.summary: ZoomProperty dependency property.

member.summary: Public constructor for Map.

member.summary: Converts a logical point within the original coordinate system to one scaled for the visual instance of the map.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.Dispose
member.summary: Cleans up the control to ensure its proper disposal.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.HidePopup
member.summary: Hides the popup.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.HidePopupNow
member.summary: Hides the popup with no delay.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.ShowPopup(ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem)
member.summary: Shows the popup for the given item.

member.summary: Shows the popup for the given item, centered over the given visual element.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.PanBy(System.Double,System.Double,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Pan a zoomed-in map by the given x and y delta.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.PanTo(System.Double,System.Double,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Center a zoomed-in map at the given x and y coordinates.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.Redraw
member.summary: Causes all loaded items, on all layers, to be redrawn.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.SelectRectangle(System.Windows.Rect,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Select items (on all layers) which significantly intersect with the given rectangle.
member.remarks: The coordinates in the given rect should be relative to the Map's content.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.ZoomBy(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Zooms the map by the given factor, centered around the given coordinates.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.ZoomTo(System.Double)
member.summary: Set the zoom level of the map to the given scale.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.ZoomTo(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Set the zoom level of the map to the given scale, centered at the given coordinates.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.ZoomTo(ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Zoom the map so that the given item fills the frame.

member.summary: Lifecycle method to be called by the framework. Do not call directly from external code.

member.name: F:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.EffectivePaletteProperty
member.summary: EffectivePaletteProperty dependency property.

member.summary: PaletteProperty dependency property.

member.summary: ThemeProperty dependency property.

member.name: F:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.ThemeVariantProperty
member.summary: ThemeVariantProperty dependency property.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.AllowAreaSelection
member.summary: Whether to allow the user to select all items (on all layers) within an area by drawing a rectangle. Default: false.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.AllowMouseWheelZooming
member.summary: Whether to allow the user to zoom the map using the mouse wheel.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.CanvasEffect
member.summary: The effect to use for elements on the map canvas.
member.remarks: Use this property to set a DropShadowEffect on map areas, for example.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.Center
member.summary: Gets or center point of a (zoomed) map.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.CoordinateBoundingBox
member.summary: The bounding box for the coordinates used on all the layers of this map.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.CoordinateBoundingBoxAutoAdjust
member.summary: Whether to automatically adjust the bounding box to fit shape data as it loads. Default: false.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.CoordinateGridBrush
member.summary: The brush to use for colouring coordinate grid lines.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.CoordinateGridInterval
member.summary: The interval (in coordinate units) at which to draw grid lines. Set to zero to disable grid lines. Default: 0.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.CoordinateGridResolution
member.summary: The resolution (in coordinate units) of points which define grid lines. Default: 0.
member.remarks: If set to zero, the control will attempt to compute a reasonable resolution.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.DownloadProgressTemplate
member.summary: The template to use for indicating the progress of the data download.
member.remarks: The indicator reflects the download progress of the first layer. Subsequent layers are drawn as they are loaded.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.FixBackground
member.summary: Whether to fix the background (not move or scale it as the map is panned or zoomed). Default: true.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.ScaleTemplates
member.summary: Whether to scale templated content when the map is zoomed. Default: true.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.Layers
member.summary: List of layers for this map.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.LegendContent
member.summary: The legend to display on the map. This can be defined as any Silverlight content.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.LegendPosition
member.summary: The position, relative to the frame of the control, at which to display the legend.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.LegendVisibility
member.summary: The visibility of the legend. If no LegendContent is explicitly set, Map will present a default legend.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.MapProjection
member.summary: The map projection to use.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.MapTranslations
member.summary: The coordinate translations to apply to all layers on this map.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.PanZoomPosition
member.summary: The position, relative to the frame of the control, at which to display the panning/zooming UI.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.PanZoomVisibility
member.summary: The visibility mode of the panning/zooming UI.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.Zoom
member.summary: Zoom (scale) factor.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.ZoomBoxPosition
member.summary: The position, relative to the frame of the control, at which to display the zoom box.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.ZoomBoxScale
member.summary: The scale at which to present the zoom box, relative to the overall map. Default: 0.25.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.ZoomBoxVisibility
member.summary: The visibility mode of the zoom box. Default: Hidden.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map.ZoomMaximum
member.summary: The maximum scale to which to allow zooming. Default: 50 (fifty times the original size).

member.summary: EffectivePalette property.

member.summary: MapPopupDataContext class. Defines the data context for popups.

member.summary: The bound data object, if any.

member.summary: The fill brush associated with active item.

member.name: T:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer
member.summary: Defines visual map items (areas, lines or points) and, optionally, data associated with them.
member.remarks:
To populate a map layer with shapes, simply set its property to to the URI describing the location (on the web, or among compiled reasources) of the shape file (.shp) containing the definitions of visual layers.
As items are loaded onto the layer, the collection will be populated with s.

member.name: F:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.ItemsSourceProperty
member.summary: ItemsSource dependency property.

member.name: F:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.PathStyleProperty
member.summary: PathStyle dependency property.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor: Added by Jeremy (temp fix?)

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.#ctor(ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.Map)
member.summary: Instantiates a map layer for the given map.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.AddItem(ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Windows.Media.PointCollection})
member.summary: Creates an area or line item defined by the given point collections and adds it to this layer.
member.remarks: The coordinates are taken in the context of the bounding box. For instance, in many cases they are the latitude and longitude.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.AddItem(ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapItem,System.Windows.Point)
member.summary: Adds a point item to this layer, at the given point.
member.remarks: The coordinates are taken in the context of the bounding box. For instance, in many cases they are the latitude and longitude.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.FindItem(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns the item with a matching data item (DataContext).

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.FindItem(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Returns the item with a matching meta-data entry, or null if not found.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.Load(System.String)
member.summary: Loads an ESRI shape file and metadata from the given location into this layer.
member.remarks: The location does not need to include the ".shp" extension.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.Load(System.Uri)
member.summary: Loads an ESRI shape file and metadata from the given location into this layer.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.Load(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Loads an ESRI shape file and associated meta data from the given streams.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.GetArea(System.Windows.Media.PointCollection)
member.summary: Returns the surface area of a polygon defined by the given points.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.GetCenterOfMass(System.Windows.Media.PointCollection)
member.summary: Returns the "center of mass" of a polygon defined by the given points.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.GetDistance(System.Windows.Point,System.Windows.Point)
member.summary: Returns the distance between two points.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.GetHighlight(System.Windows.Media.Color,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the highlighted version of the given colour.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.LoadPoint(System.Byte[])
member.summary: This method takes a raw SHP point record and returns a the logical point, in the original coordinate box.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.LoadPoly(System.Byte[])
member.summary: This method takes a raw SHP polyline or polygon record and returns a list of logical point collections, in the original coordinate box.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.RenderPoint(System.Windows.Point)
member.summary: This method takes a logical point in the original coordinate box and produces a visual element within the canvas.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.RenderPoly(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Windows.Media.PointCollection},System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method takes a list of logical point collections in the original coordinate box, representing polygons and polylines, and produces visual elements within the canvas.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.AllowSelection
member.summary: Whether to allow the user to select an area. Default: true.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.AllowMultipleSelection
member.summary: Whether to allow the user to select multiple areas. Default: true.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.BubbleFillRule
member.summary: Defines how bubble visualizations should be coloured according to data on this layer.
member.remarks: To make bubbles automatically appear, BubbleSizeRule must also be set.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.BubbleSizeRule
member.summary: Defines how bubble visualizations should be sized according to data on this layer.
member.remarks: If set, bubbles will be rendered over data-bound items on this layer, sized according to the rule. The size will map to the bubble's surface area, in pixels squared.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.DataBindingMetaDataKey
member.summary: The key in item metadata which connects an item to an object in this layer's provided ItemsSource.
member.remarks: The value of the metadata entry under this key is matched with a corresponding property value of an object in ItemsSource. The matching object becomes the DataContext for the corresponding MapItem as well as its constituent elements.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.DataBindingItemPropertyName
member.summary: The name of the property on objects in ItemsSource which connects them to items on this map layer.
member.remarks: The value of this property is matched with a corresponding metadata value of a map item. The matching object becomes the DataContext for the corresponding MapItem as well as its constituent elements.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.FillBrushes
member.summary: Defines a list of brushes to use for colouring items on this layer.
member.remarks: If set, the fill for items on this layer is set to brushes in this collection, chosen in order.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.FillRule
member.summary: Defines how items on this layer should be coloured according to values coming from data.
member.remarks: If set, the fill for items on this layer is set according to the defined rule and data context.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.ItemPointXPath
member.summary: The property path in objects contained in ItemsSource at which to find horizontal coordinates for automatically plotting points.
member.remarks: If ItemPointXPath, ItemPointYPath and ItemTemplate are set, points will be plotted automatically when ItemsSource is set.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.ItemPointYPath
member.summary: The property path in objects contained in ItemsSource at which to find vertical coordinates for automatically plotting points.
member.remarks: If ItemPointXPath, ItemPointYPath and ItemTemplate are set, points will be plotted automatically when ItemsSource is set.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.Items
member.summary: List of map items on this layer.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.ItemsSource
member.summary: An external source of data for items on this layer.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.ItemTemplate
member.summary: The template to use for items drawn on this layer.
member.remarks: In the case of point items, the content template is displayed at the point's coordinates. In the case of areas and lines, the template appears centered over the item.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.ItemSelectedTemplate
member.summary: The template to use for selected items on this layer.
member.remarks: If set, the content defined by this template replaces that of the standard item template when the item is selected.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.LabelBinding
member.summary: The binding to use for populating labels from data items.
member.remarks: The context for such a binding is the associated MapItem. To bind labels to a property of data objects, we set LabelBinding="{Binding DataItem.PropertyName}"

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.LabelField
member.summary: The meta-data (DBF) field to use for default area labels.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.LabelForeground
member.summary: The Brush to use on the Foreground of labels.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.OwningMap
member.summary: The Map control to which this layer belongs.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.PathStyle
member.summary: PathStyle property.
member.remarks: The TargetType of the Style should be "Path". The style is applied to each Path belonging to a logical MapItem on this layer.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.PopupIndexField
member.summary: The meta-data field from which to optionally get the index value of the popup.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.PopupIndexTemplate
member.summary: The template to use for the item popup index area.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.PopupValueTemplate
member.summary: The template to use for the item popup value area.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.PopupVisibility
member.summary: Regulates the visibility mode of popups. Default: On.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.PopupShowDefaultChrome
member.summary: Determines whether popups should display default themed chrome and index header in addition to the value template. Default: true.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.SelectedItems
member.summary: List of currently selected areas.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.ShapeFile
member.summary: The name and location of the ESRI shapefile to load.
member.remarks: The string can be a relative or absolute URI, and the extension can optionally be omitted. The URI can point to a resource in a loaded assembly, or a file on the web. A DBF file will also automatically be sought alongside the SHP file.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.ShapeFileUtmZone
member.summary: The Universal Transverse Mercator zone for which the coordinates in the shape file are intended. Default: -1. (don't convert).
member.remarks: This should only be set if the desire is to convert the UTM coordinates to longitude/latitude during loading.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.Visibility
member.summary: The visibility of this layer.

member.name: E:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.DataLoaded
member.summary: Fires when the meta-data (DBF) for this layer is done loading.

member.name: E:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.DataLoadedForItem
member.summary: Fires when meta-data (DBF) for an item is loaded.

member.name: E:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.ItemClick
member.summary: Fires when an item on this layer is clicked.

member.name: E:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.ItemDoubleClick
member.summary: Fires when an item on this layer is double-clicked.

member.name: E:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.ItemLoaded
member.summary: Fires when an item (SHP) is loaded.

member.name: E:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.ItemMouseEnter
member.summary: Fires when the mouse enters an item on this layer.

member.name: E:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.ItemMouseLeave
member.summary: Fires when the mouse leaves an item on this layer.

member.name: E:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.ItemRendered
member.summary: Fires when a map item is done rendering.

member.name: E:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.ItemsLoaded
member.summary: Fires when the map items (SHP) for this layer are done loading.

member.name: E:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.ItemsRendered
member.summary: Fires when the map items for this layer are done rendering.

member.name: E:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapLayer.ItemSelectionChanged
member.summary: Fires when the selected items are changed on this layer.

member.name: T:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapProjection
member.summary: MapProjection class. Defines how logical coordinates are converted before being displayed on the screen.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapProjection.Convert(System.Windows.Point)
member.summary: Converts a point in logical coordinates to one which corresponds to the same location under this projection.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapProjection.Convert(System.Windows.Rect)
member.summary: Converts a Rect in logical coordinates to one which corresponds to the same location under this projection.

member.name: E:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MapProjection.PropertyChanged
member.summary: Fires when a member property's value changes.

member.name: T:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.EquirectangularMapProjection
member.summary: This class describes an equirectangular projection and provides the necessary functionality to apply it.

member.name: T:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MercatorMapProjection
member.summary: This class describes a Mercator projection and provides the necessary functionality to apply it.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MercatorMapProjection.Convert(System.Windows.Point)
member.summary: Converts a point in logical coordinates to one which corresponds to the same location under this projection.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MercatorMapProjection.MinLatitude
member.summary: The minimum latitude below which to cut off the map. Default: -60.
member.remarks: This is typically used to remove heavily distorted Antarctica from Mercator world maps. Note that the South Pole cannot be shown on Mercator maps, so this must be set to something greater than -90.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MercatorMapProjection.MaxLatitude
member.summary: The maximum latitude above which to cut off the map. Default: 88.
member.remarks: This is typically used to remove the heavily distorted Arctic from Mercator world maps. Note that the North Pole cannot be shown on Mercator maps, so this must be set to something less than 90.

member.name: T:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MillerMapProjection
member.summary: This class describes a Miller projection and provides the necessary functionality to apply it.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.MillerMapProjection.Convert(System.Windows.Point)
member.summary: Converts a point in logical coordinates to one which corresponds to the same location under this projection.

member.name: T:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.RobinsonMapProjection
member.summary: This class describes a Robison projection and provides the necessary functionality to apply it.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.RobinsonMapProjection.Convert(System.Windows.Point)
member.summary: Converts a point in logical coordinates to one which corresponds to the same location under this projection.

member.name: T:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.BonneMapProjection
member.summary: This class describes a Bonne projection and provides the necessary functionality to apply it.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.BonneMapProjection.Convert(System.Windows.Point)
member.summary: Converts a point in logical coordinates to one which corresponds to the same location under this projection.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.BonneMapProjection.StandardParallel
member.summary: Specifies the standard parallel to use for this Bonne projection. Default: 45.

member.name: T:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.AlbersMapProjection
member.summary: This class describes an Albers projection and provides the necessary functionality to apply it.

member.name: M:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.AlbersMapProjection.Convert(System.Windows.Point)
member.summary: Converts a point in logical coordinates to one which corresponds to the same location under this projection.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.AlbersMapProjection.FirstStandardParallel
member.summary: Specifies the first standard parallel to use for this Albers projection. Default: 0.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.AlbersMapProjection.SecondStandardParallel
member.summary: Specifies the second standard parallel to use for this Bonne projection. Default: 60.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.AlbersMapProjection.Origin
member.summary: Specifies the origin to use for this Albers projection. Default: (0, 0).

member.name: T:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.LambertConformalConicMapProjection
member.summary: This class describes a Lambert Conformal Conic projection and provides the necessary functionality to apply it.

member.summary: Converts a point in logical coordinates to one which corresponds to the same location under this projection.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.LambertConformalConicMapProjection.FirstStandardParallel
member.summary: Specifies the first standard parallel to use for this Lambert Conformal Conic projection. Default: 30.

member.name: P:ComponentArt.Silverlight.DataVisualization.Mapping.LambertConformalConicMapProjection.SecondStandardParallel
member.summary: Specifies the second standard parallel to use for this Lambert Conformal Conic projection. Default: 60.

member.summary: Specifies the origin to use for this Albers projection. Default: (0, 0).
